books.title: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING
books.author: Delia Owens
books.synopsis: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

books.title: IT ENDS WITH US
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.synopsis: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.

books.title: VERITY
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.synopsis: Lowen Ashleigh is hired by the husband of an injured writer to complete her popular series and uncovers a horrifying truth.

books.title: UGLY LOVE
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.synopsis: Tate Collins and Miles Archer, an airline pilot, think they can handle a no strings attached arrangement. But they can't.

books.title: NOVEMBER 9
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.synopsis: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?

books.title: RECKONING
books.author: Catherine Coulter
books.synopsis: The 26th book in the F.B.I. thriller series. Savich and Sherlock are enlisted to protect women with traumatic pasts.

books.title: THE SEVEN HUSBANDS OF EVELYN HUGO
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.synopsis: A movie icon recounts stories of her loves and career to a struggling magazine writer.

books.title: THE 6:20 MAN
books.author: David Baldacci
books.synopsis: When his ex-girlfriend turns up dead in his office building, an entry-level investment analyst delves into the halls of economic power.
